jedi:meditation.NAME: Meditation
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFocus at the end of your turn AFTER orb #ypassive effects trigger. Lose ALL #yFocus whenever you lose HP.

jedi:upgradeondraw.NAME: Better
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card this round, #yupgrade it.
